title: Le Bris striving for ruthlessness after Sunderland´s defeat to Sporting CP
description: Regis Le Bris urged his Sunderland team to show more ruthlessness in front of goal after falling to a 1-0 defeat against Primeira Liga champions Sporting CP. Sunderland concluded their pre-season training camp in Portugal with a narrow defeat, decided by Francisco Trincao’s strike in the 11th minute of the contest.
